product_name: Moving Comfort Aurora A/B Sports Bra - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Smooth, seamless and adjustable, the Moving Comfort Aurora A/B Sports Bra delivers all-day comfort and a fantastic fit for yoga workouts, hikes and all-around fitness fun wherever you roam.
